title.rendered: TTE FM conducts workshop for NBF

content.rendered: TTE Facilities Management (FM) conducted an informative workshop exclusively for clients from the National Bank of Fujairah to give an understanding of international FM standards for maintenance and soft services. The session focused on TTE FM’s customized management system which has a dashboard that gives real-time insights, a list of services rendered and also the condition of assets, leading to complete transparency. The aim of the workshop was to showcase how advanced tools and strategies can enhance efficiency and elevate FM practices ultimately benefiting the client.
